title: Rules are good directions (TEFC)
brief_description: Explores the child’s world of rules. Involves the viewer in a series of decisionmaking situations which make children aware of the need for rules, ways to judge their fairness and ways to accept responsibility for their enforcement. Suitable for primary level.
